    public interface AttributeWriteMaximumTextLength
extends AttributeReadMaximumTextLength
    This interface gives read and write access to the maximum text length of an object.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setMaximumTextLength(int length)
      This method sets the maximum text length of this object.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeReadMaximumTextLength

        getMaximumTextLength

    • Method Detail

      • setMaximumTextLength

        void setMaximumTextLength(int length)
        This method sets the maximum text length of this object.
        ATTENTION:
        If you are setting this property on a UI field, the typical behavior is that after the maximum text length is reached, any additional input is ignored. This also applies for copy and paste operations. For usability this might be undesired in many cases as users can not append something and then remove a prefix afterwards if the length would be exceeded. Please consider using a validator instead and only use this feature in situations where it is really suitable.
        Parameters:
        length - is the new maximum text length to set. Use Integer.MAX_VALUE to unset.
